about_the_game: Its old name was YopYop DS and the author of the program was YopYop156. The purpose of this core to run Dual Screen games. When DesmuME was first released, it supported home-made games called homebrew. Later, this support was improved. It is still under development.
detailed_description: Its old name was YopYop DS and the author of the program was YopYop156. The purpose of this core to run Dual Screen games. When DesmuME was first released, it supported home-made games called homebrew. Later, this support was improved. It is still under development.
legal_notice:
RetroArch is free/open source software, available under the GNU GPL 3.0 license.

It does not contain any copyrighted material by third parties. RetroArch does not condone piracy in any way, shape or form.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: RetroArch - DesmuME

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Graphics: Any GPU and driver that supports OpenGL v2.0 or higher

short_description: Its old name was YopYop DS and the author of the program was YopYop156. The purpose of this core to run Dual Screen games. When DesmuME was first released, it supported home-made games called homebrew. Later, this support was improved. It is still under development.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
